context.p: To install on OS X, follow these steps:

step.cmd: Download the OS X installation package ().
step.info: The Safari web browser should recognize and expand the compressed file. If it is not automatically expanded, you can expand it manually by double-clicking it.

step.cmd: Validate the integrity of the downloaded file by checking it against the MD5 sum published on the download page.
In Finder, move the expanded folder to your Applications folder.
Start , using one of the following methods:

choice.p: Double-click Oxygen XML Editor.appOxygen XML Author.appOxygen XML Developer.appSyncro SVN Client.app.

choices.choice: Run sh oxygenMac.shsh oxygenAuthorMac.shsh oxygenDeveloperMac.shsh syncroSVNClientMac.sh on the command line.

info.note: You can start multiple instances on the same computer by running the following command for each new instance:open -n

step.cmd: To license your copy of , go to Help Register to enter your license key.
